configSaved: Configuration saved! Version is already up to date.
javaModalDescription: Java is not detected on your system. It is required to run the server.
javaModalHint: This will download and install the latest supported JDK automatically.
serverPropsUnavailable: Could not load server.properties. Run the server once to generate it.
settingsPageDescription: Adjust your server and launcher configuration in one place.
setupDescription: Server files or configuration are missing. Please select options and click 'Download / Configure'.
setupPlaceholder: Complete server configuration in the setup panel to unlock controls.
setupBannerHint: Choose your preferred server flavour, version, and memory allocation before downloading.
setupTipChooseFlavour: Select the server flavour that matches the plugins or mods you want to use.
setupTipAdjustLater: You can adjust these options later from the settings menu.
setupTipMonitor: The download runs in the background—stay here to monitor progress.
setupNgrokTip:
Dreaming of hosting a Minecraft LAN that works anywhere in the world?
Download ngrok from the official website (ngrok.com), log in, and copy your authtoken.
Open your terminal where ngrok is installed and run the command to add your authtoken.
Once ngrok is set up, launch your Minecraft server — the launcher will automatically generate a secure TCP address ready to share.
No port forwarding, no IP sharing, no headaches.
setupFooterHint: Click the button to download and configure everything automatically.
addonsManagedManually: Manage Bedrock add-ons directly from the server folder.
addonsDeleteUnavailable: Launcher cannot delete Bedrock add-ons automatically.
addonsUploadUnavailable: Bedrock add-ons must be managed manually.
stopBeforeDeletingMods: Stop the server before deleting mods.
stopBeforeDeletingPlugins: Stop the server before deleting plugins.
pluginsPageDescription: Manage plugins, mods, add-ons, and server.properties without leaving the launcher.
